description: The actor Ichimura Takenojō IV as the page Kichisaburō in the play Nanakusa fukki Soga 七種福貴曽我, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the first month of 1718
medium: Woodblock print (urushi-e); ink on paper, with hand-applied color
title: [The actor Ichimura Takenojō IV as the page Kichisaburō]
